video_section.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting.

slide_one.title: One password for all sailing apps and data:
slide_one.description: syrf.io allows third party developers to use your SYRF profile for authentication. This means you have one less password to remember for your favorite sailing apps.

slide_two.title: You control who can access your sailing data:
slide_two.description: syrf.io is like Google Drive for all of your sailing data. 3rd party apps (such as those from your favorite sailing organization) can request to import your data. You retain strict control over who does and doesn’t have access.

slide_three.title: GDPR & CCPA Compliant:
slide_three.description: We take your privacy seriously. Our apps go above and beyond to ensure we only collect race related data and that your data is anonymized and protected. We never, EVER, sell your data to 3rd parties and our revenue model does not rely on personalized advertising. We only use cookies with your permission and you are free to delete your data at any time.

slide_four.title: Organization independent:
slide_four.description: The sailing world is full of passionate groups of people. We decided to build tech that enables everyone, rather than hitching our wagon to any one organization in particular. By staying unaffiliated, SYRF is able to stay innovative and build tools for everyone.

footer.title: Are you a developer who wants to use SYRF.io?
footer.description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book. It has survived not only five centuries, but also the leap into electronic typesetting.
footer.syrf_description: syrf.io is a project built by the Sailing Yacht Research Foundation. SYRF is the only non profit to focus on using science and technology to advance the sport of sailing. SYRF is what happens when you pair the world’s most accomplished and capable sailors with the world’s most accomplished and capable technologists.
